PERSONA:
sarah is a 35-year-old divorced white woman living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region of the united states, specifically in the middle atlantic division. she is a high school graduate and does not have any further formal education. sarah was born and raised in the u.s. and is a citizen.

sarah identifies as a roman catholic, although she attends religious services only a few times a year. she does not consider herself a born-again or evangelical christian. politically, sarah identifies as an independent, but she leans towards the republican party and holds moderate to liberal views.

sarah's annual family income falls in the range of $30,000 to less than $40,000, placing her in the lower-income tier. despite her modest income, she is registered to vote at her current address and values her civic duty.

in her personal life, sarah is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online. however, she does not currently participate in any volunteer activities. she enjoys the conveniences of metropolitan living while maintaining her connections to her cultural and religious roots.
